>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

You can use your nanites to rout your foes directly. While your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.QoCQEVNtgMhsElwQ]{sheath array} is active, you can use a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{nanite surge} to send your nanites rocketing off your body with powerful force. Attempt a single @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#bull-rush]{bull rush} combat maneuver that targets each creature within 15 feet of you; you can use your Constitution modifier for this attack roll instead of your Strength modifier. Regardless of the result of the bull rush, each creature targeted in this way takes force damage equal to your Constitution modifier. After using violent dispersal, your nanites disperse, ending your sheath array. You canâ€™t use violent dispersal again until you spend 1 Resolve Point to regain Stamina Points after a 10 minute rest.
